Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
Matrix
public class Matrix extends Object
Matrix class supporting common matrix operations. The frame of the code. All elements are represented with double precision.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Matrix other)
      Checks if this matrix is equal to another matrix. Matrices are equal if they have the same dimensions and identical elements.
      Parameters:
      other - Matrix to compare against
      Returns:
      True if matrices are identical, otherwise false

    • identity

      public static Matrix identity(int size)
      Generates an identity matrix of given size.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the square identity matrix
      Returns:
      A new identity matrix

    • subMatrix

      public Matrix subMatrix(int rowStart, int rowEnd, int colStart, int colEnd)
      Extracts a submatrix from this matrix.
      Parameters:
      rowStart - Starting row index (inclusive)
      rowEnd - Ending row index (exclusive)
      colStart - Starting column index (inclusive)
      colEnd - Ending column index (exclusive)
      Returns:
      A new submatrix
